attributes.action: TAKE THE VOICE OF THE ORDINARY PEOPLE OF BRITAIN (YOUR ELECTORATE) AND LET IT BE KNOWN TO THE UN AND THE REST OF THE WORLD, THAT THE KILLING OF INNOCENTS IN GAZA MUST STOP.THEY MUST ACT NOW .THEY CANNOT ALLOW ANY MORE STALLING BY UN MEMBER COUNTRIES .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHAT IS HAPPENING IN GAZA MIGHT BE ACCEPTABLE TO THE MEN IN POWER BUT IT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE TO US ORDINARY MEN, WOMEN AND CHILDREN OF THE WORLD.BE IT THE ISRAELIS WITH THEIR MASSIVE ARSENAL OR HAMAS WITH THEIR SO CALLED PRIMITIVE WEAPONS,WE ARE TALKING ABOUT INNOCENT HUMANS JUST LIKE OURSELVES BEING KILLED MAIMED,AND MADE HOMELESS AT THE COMMAND OF THE MEN IN POWER TO SETTLE A SCORE.WE THE PEOPLE DEMAND IT STOPS AND WE ASK THOSE WHO WE ELECTED TO DO MORE TO STOP THE KILLING FIELDS NOW !

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
